title: NEET UG 2024 : SC refuses to stay re - test or postpone counselling
body_text:
NEET UG 2024: SC refuses to stay re-test or postpone counselling
The Supreme Court has refused to stay the re-test proposed by the NTA for 1,563 NEET-UG 2024 candidates and rejected a plea to postpone counselling. The court also questioned the contradictory arguments made by the petitioners and rejected a request to pause counselling. However, the court has asked the NTA to decide on a candidate's plea for a re-test due to a rare medical condition.
